refnamediv.refpurpose: see if Openswan has been installed correctly, interacting with a test target

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Invoked without argument, livetest attempts to connect to livetest.xelerance.com in multiple secure fashions. It first attempts ping, then ikeping on udp port 500, ikeping on udp port 4500, then configures a connection using a random ID, using a a custom HTTP-based protocol.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: Written by Xelerance Corporation for the Openswan project <http://www.openswan.org> by Paul Wouters.
